request.positivePrompt: Scene: Inside a narrow, damp tunnel entrance just below the alley, illuminated by ethereal glimmering light from the water and the glowing red aura around a small magical squirrel. Characters: Adrian (golden curly hair, bright blue eyes, casual hoodie/white crewneck), Alexander (tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, layered hoodie and zip vest), Frau Müller (78yo in green/gray/beige), and Squirrel Emma (red-brown fur, cream belly, black eyes with a red magical aura and glow). Action: Squirrel Emma is leaping up from a glittering whirlpool; Adrian placing a foot on a slippery stone while Alexander holds a string; Frau Müller handing the string to the boys. Lighting: magical inner glow from the water casts warm highlights; cooler tunnel shadows frame the scene. Mood: tense, brave, whimsical. Camera perspective: medium shot from slightly above to show the trio’s positions on the stones and the squirrel in mid-air. Environment specifics: mossy wet stones, woven light patterns on the water, scent of metal and crushed leaves implied. Recurring motifs: light patterns, the thin melody represented as visual ripples. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Frau Müller: Frau Müller • ['Frau Müller', ' 78 years'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Adrian (5-7y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
